function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contamination of the environment with tb particulates","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission of tb disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonsignificant trend for uv lights to be more protective than ionizers against tb infection and disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in tb infections and disease due to ionizers and uv lights","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in a clinical setting.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate positioning or installation of uv fixtures leading to occupant over-exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety measures leading to adverse uv effects on patients and staff","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate uv intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of uv bulbs.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for upper-room uv installation and maintenance, leading to ineffective use.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on expensive uv fixtures and bulbs, limiting accessibility in resource-limited settings.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on natural convection currents for effective uv light efficacy, which may not be sufficient in all environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uv in protecting health care workers from airborne infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on uv germicidal efficacy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing tb transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of tb-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and handling of the ionizers leading to potential contamination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of testing with artificial aerosols to evaluate airflow patterns and particle loss between ward and roof","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential differences in ionizer effect on tb transmission between ward and animal facility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tb infection spreading in overcrowded settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of studies in clinical settings for environmental control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with ppd conversion and tb infection in animals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding in congregate settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory isolation facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious spread of mycobacterium tuberculosis through airborne droplets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dormant tuberculosis bacteria causing disease years after initial infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drug-resistant tuberculosis requiring prolonged and challenging treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of drug-resistant m. tuberculosis strains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission in healthcare settings and resource-limited settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated air from an hiv-tb ward","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation in the ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Upper-room uv lights and negative air ionization might not be effective at preventing airborne tuberculosis transmission in humans.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information dissemination on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control in healthcare settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to integrated hiv and tuberculosis information","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aumento significativo da curva epidemiológica devido à pandemia da covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentração das iniciativas de adoção de tecnologia em locais historicamente favoráveis à inovação","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoção de tecnologia digital na otimização dos serviços segue uma tendência mundial","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aumento significativo de la curva epidemiológica en brasilia","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adopción de tecnología digital en el 83% de las ciudades encuestadas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases in smart cities due to lack of effective monitoring and interpretation of health-related data.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate management of urban mobility and connections between individuals, leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consolidate public policies and administrative actions during periods of declining disease curve, leading to complacency and inadequate preparedness for future outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may not have followed or preceded the predicted growth of the infection curve, impacting the effectiveness of response to the pandemic situation.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may have been a response after the rise of the infection curves in the cities, leading to a speed of response driven by the immediacy-led demands of the faced situation.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools by public management may have challenges in implementation and adaptation of activities, particularly in the context of isolation measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
